ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: (Supports) I have people that will help me if I run into problems taking my medications regularly.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Knowledge) I know the basics about bipolar disorder and medications for bipolar disorder.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Norms) I am willing to take medications because of my relationship with my psychiatrist.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Norms) Most people I know would be in favor of my taking medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Norms) People with bipolar disorder who stay well take medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Perceptions - Risk susceptibility) My risk for mood episodes is high enough to offset the trouble of taking medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Perceptions - Risk susceptibility) Being well for several months makes me consider coming off my medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Perceptions - Risk severity) Problems caused by my mood episodes are bad enough for me to take medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Perceptions - Risk severity) I doubt that my bipolar disorder is serious enough for me to take medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes  - Positive Instrumental) Taking medications reduces my risk of having a mood episode.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Positive Instrumental) I take medications to reduce my risk of being hospitalized.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Negative Instrumental) I am reluctant to take medications because of the costs.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Negative Instrumental) It is hard to remember to take my medications at the right times.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Positive Affective) When I take my medications regularly I feel good and stable.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Positive Affective) When I take my medications regularly I feel good about my relationships.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Negative Affective) I don't feel like myself when I take medications.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Attitudes - Negative Affective) The unpleasant effects of medications are always present.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Capabilities) I have been able to take my medications as prescribed for extended periods of time.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Self-Efficacy - Task) I am capable of taking medications daily without missing any doses.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Self-Efficacy - Maintenance) I am confident that I can take my medications even when difficult situations arise.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Self-Efficacy - Recovery) I am confident that I could get back to taking my medications even if I stopped taking them for awhile.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Intention) I intend to take all my medications without missing any doses.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Planning - Goal Setting) My goal is to learn and do what I need to so I can take my medications as prescribed.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Planning - Action) I have a plan to help me take my medications as prescribed.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Planning - Coping) I have a plan for taking my medications when problems make it difficult.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Control - Awareness, Monitoring, Evaluation) I pay attention to whether or not I take my medications as prescribed.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Control - Adjustment) When I notice I am not taking my medications as prescribed, I adjust what I am doing to get back on track.
Notes: -3=Strongly Disagree; -2=Disagree; -1=Somewhat Disagree; 0=Neither Agree Nor Disagree; 1=Somewhat Agree; 2=Agree; 3=Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: (Supports) I have people that will help me if I run into problems consistently sleeping as recommended.
